topic_or_construct: Handoff engagement (willingness to book a financial advisor consultation)
justification: "The primary outcome was handoff engagement, or willingness to book a consultation with a financial advisor, which was measured through open and CTRs for email 4 only… We measured engagement again through link clicks within the survey."
